column1: Uchi////Definitely restating what everyone else's reviews say
column2: but this place is uh.  maze.  ing.  This is definitely a special occasion type restaurant (unless you're baller enough to eat here on the reg
column3: if so hollaaaaa ;) ).  The prices of the dishes are regularly on the steeper side
column4: but the quality of the ingredients is worth the price IMO.  Some of the combinations sound weird at first
column5: but somehow it just works.  The dishes are meant to be shared amongst the table
column7: you honestly can't go wrong anywhere.  Also
column8: I'm fairly certain their Brussels sprouts are laced with crack.
